page.title: 12Health
page.content: A District Nurse travels the district daily to attend to the elderly and the sick. She also visits mothers and babies. The nearest doctor is in Ashley or Eccleshall; as each doctor dispenses his or her own prescriptions, there is no difficulty about getting medication quickly and easily. The nearest Children's Clinic is in Eccleshall. A Meals on Wheels service supplies the old people with a daily dinner ( the meals are cooked at the Women's Prison near Eccleshall). The meals are taken round by local volunteers. This is an valuable check on the welfare of the elderly, as they get a daily visit. If necessary the appropriate help can be summoned.
